card.name: Alien Invader
card.property: Each time you assign Alien Invader, you may destroy an assigned support character and place them face up beneath Alien Invader. Your opponent can't play copies of the characters beneath Alien Invader.

card.name: Amonet
card.property: When you play Amonet, destroy a stopped support character and place them face up beneath Amonet. That character's skills are added to Amonet's difficulty ratings. Destroy Amonet - Stop a support character.

card.name: Athon
card.property: Destroy Athon - Ready an adversary and gain 1 power.

card.name: Bastet
card.property: At the start of the debrief phase, if this turn there was no successful mission and you have not scored an adversary, you may score Bastet. Stop Bastet or Morrigan, discard a card - Draw a card.

card.name: The Canon
card.property: After each time your opponent looks at cards in their mission pile and/or reorders them, you may destroy The Canon. If you do, look at the top and bottom cards of that pile, then you may switch their position.

card.name: Cetus
card.property: Each time your opponent gains power during the mission phase, you gain the same amount of power. Each time you assign Cetus, your opponent gains 1 power and you draw a card.

card.name: Frank Simmons
card.property: Frank Simmons gets difficulty +1 while a hero ship is assigned. While Frank Simmons is assigned, to assign a character, your opponent pays 1 power for each other Political and/or Goa'uld card at the current mission.

card.name: Gerak
card.property: Gerak gets difficulty +1 while you have no power remaining. Failure: Stop all support characters. Then, gain 1 power for each stopped character who is not Jaffa.

card.name: Gildeas
card.property: When you score Gildeas, you may search your deck for an adversary, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. If the revealed adversary was Ori, gain 1 power.

card.name: Harold Fisher
card.property: Harold Fisher gets difficulty +1 for each gear.

card.name: Jonas Hanson
card.property: Jonas Hanson costs power +1 to play for each SGC team character. While Jonas Hanson is assigned, each SGC character gets skills -1, and your opponent must pay 1 power to assign an SGC support character.

card.name: Jumar
card.property: Destroy Jumar - The next obstacle with an ambush text you play this mission costs power -1 to play, and it becomes prepared immediately after you play it.

card.name: Kalfas
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a gear or ship, you may stop Kalfas. If you do, stop that gear or ship.

card.name: Lucius
card.property: Stop Lucius, pay 3 power - Choose an assigned character. If the current mission is a Science or an Ingenuity mission, it gets difficulty +X, where X is the chosen character's contributing skill.

card.name: Malakai
card.property: Each time you revive Malakai, you may pay 1 power. If you do, ready him. Failure: At the end of the current mission, if your opponent decides to continue, but before they play their next mission, you may place the current mission on top of their mission pile.

card.name: Marooned Wraith
card.property: To assign Marooned Wraith, you must drain 3. Failure: Destroy a stopped support character.

card.name: "Michael"
card.property: Each time you assign "Michael," you may turn an assigned support character face down (they become a complication) and that complication gets: "When this complication is destroyed, return this card to its owner's hand."

card.name: Morrigan
card.property: Stop Morrigan or Bastet - Gain 1 power. Pay 1 power - Draw a card. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Orel
card.property: Orel gets difficulty +1 for each Jaffa obstacle at the current mission and each prepared Jaffa obstacle.

card.name: Oshu
card.property: Oshu gets difficulty +1 while you control Yu. Each time you assign Oshu, your opponent may pay X power. If they do, Oshu gets difficulty -X until the end of the turn, and you gain X power.

card.name: Replicator Carter
card.property: You may use any Replicator card to boost Replicator Carter, then place the card you used to boost her face down beneath her. When you score Replicator Carter, gain 1 power for each card beneath her, then take those cards into hand.

card.name: Terok
card.property: Each time you assign Terok, discard a number of cards equal to the experience of the current mission, then draw that many cards. Stop Terok - Block a character until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Trelak
card.property: Trelak gets difficulty +1 while a villain Jaffa ship or a Goa'uld ship is assigned. Failure: Take a Jaffa obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Volnek
card.property: Volnek can't be scored. Volnek gets revive cost -1 for each obstacle card in your villain score pile. Each time Volnek would be destroyed, you may pay his revive cost to prevent that.

card.name: Wraith Attendant
card.property: Wraith Vassal. Each time an adversary would be destroyed, if Wraith Attendant is ready or assigned with that adversary, you may destroy him. If you do, that adversary is stopped instead. If that adversary is Wraith, your opponent must drain 3.

card.name: Wraith King
card.property: You may act first during Combat and Ingenuity missions. At the end of each Combat and Ingenuity mission, if Wraith King was not assigned during its resolution, destroy him.

card.name: Anteaus
card.property: Your opponent gains 1 power - Remove the Failure or Victory text on an obstacle, or on an assigned adversary or villain ship, until the end of the current mission. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Arthur Simms
card.property: Each time you play a Culture mission, if Arthur Simms is not ready, you lose 1 power.

card.name: Ashwan
card.property: When you play Ashwan, you may pay 2 power. If you do, return a Political card in play to its owner's hand. (This may target a prepared Political obstacle.)

card.name: Barnes
card.property: Grit. You can't play Barnes, unless there was a successful mission this turn.

card.name: Caius
card.property: Caius costs power -1 to play for each gear and hero ship.

card.name: Chaya Sar
card.property: While a villain ship is assigned, Chaya Sar gets Combat +2. While Chaya Sar is assigned, she gets: "Return Chaya Sar to your hand - Return an obstacle at the current mission to its owner's hand."

card.name: Harlow
card.property: Stop Harlow, pay 1 power - Remove the failure text from a Disease obstacle at the current mission. Stop and destroy Harlow, pay 2 power - Destroy a Disease obstacle at the current mission or on a character.

card.name: Katana Labrea
card.property: Each time you assign Katana Labrea, you may pay 2 power and discard a card. If you do, ready another support character with no affiliation trait.

card.name: Kerrigan
card.property: When you play Kerrigan, you may play an SGC support character at no cost. Destroy Kerrigan - Place a promotion token on a character.

card.name: Kvasir
card.property: To assign Kvasir, pay 2 power, unless there is an assigned Asgard ship.

card.name: Lortash
card.property: Lortash costs power -1 to play while an adversary is assigned (or -2 if that adversary is Goa'uld). Each time another character would be destroyed or incapacitated, you may purge Lortash. If you do, prevent that.

card.name: Martin Kennedy
card.property: During your opponent's turn, Martin Kennedy becomes a Political adversary. He can't be revived or scored.

card.name: Miyashi
card.property: When you play Miyashi, he gets Culture +2 and Ingenuity +2 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Nem
card.property: Nem gets skills +1 when assigned with another character with 2 Culture or more.

card.name: Nisal
card.property: You can't play Nisal, unless a support character was destroyed this turn.

card.name: Pavlenko
card.property: You can't play Pavlenko, unless there was a failed mission this turn.

card.name: Radner
card.property: When you play Radner, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready a gear.

card.name: Rothman
card.property: You can't play Rothman, unless you have discarded or drawn a card this turn.

card.name: Ryan
card.property: When you play Ryan, you may block an adversary until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Seymour
card.property: You can't play Seymour, unless an adversary is assigned.

card.name: Shallan
card.property: You can't play Shallan, unless you have already played another support character this turn.

card.name: Singer
card.property: While an adversary is assigned, Singer gets Combat +1 (or Combat +2 if that adversary is Goa'uld).

card.name: Stepan Zaitzev
card.property: When you play Stepan Zaitzev, you may stop him and pay 2 power. If you do, ready a team character.

card.name: Tomin
card.property: Tomin gets skills +1 while assigned with a character who has a glyph. While Tomin is assigned, he gets: "Destroy Tomin, pay 2 power - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission."

card.name: Aiden Ford
card.property: Pisces: To play an obstacle while Aiden Ford is assigned, your opponent must drain 1 for each Pisces glyph he has. Pisces and Pisces: Aiden Ford gets skills +1.

card.name: Ben Pierce
card.property: Each time another character earns a glyph Ben Pierce has, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Ben Pierce. Orion, Stop Ben Pierce - Each other team character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Camile Wray
card.property: Each time another character earns a glyph Camile Wray has, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready either one of them. Gemini: Each time your opponent plays a Political obstacle, gain 1 power.

card.name: Dave Kleinman
card.property: Victory: Your opponent loses 1 power for each Gemini glyph Dave Kleinman has, and you gain 1 power for each Libra glyph Dave Kleinman has.

card.name: David Telford
card.property: Gemini and Gemini: Each time your opponent plays an obstacle, gain 1 power. Orion and Orion: Each time your opponent plays an obstacle, gain 1 power. Triangulum and Triangulum: Each time your opponent plays an obstacle, gain 1 power.

card.name: Dillon Everett
card.property: Pisces or Scorpius: Dillon Everett gets skills +1. Pisces and Scorpius: While Dillon Everett is ready or assigned, missions get difficulty -1.

card.name: Elizabeth Weir
card.property: Triangulum, Stop and incapacitate Elizabeth Weir - Destroy all obstacles at the current mission. You can only do this once each turn. Pay 6 power - Ready Elizabeth Weir. This ability costs power -1 for each Replicator obstacle destroyed this turn, and can be used while incapacitated.

card.name: Freyr
card.property: Scorpius or Triangulum: While you have at least one assigned Asgard ship, you get total firepower +1 during each ship battle. Scorpius and Triangulum, Stop Freyr - Choose an Asgard ship to get: "Victory: Ready and/or unblock an Asgard character. You may assign them immediately" until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Hermiod
card.property: Success: Gain 1 power. Failure: Lose 1 power. Pisces or Scorpius, Pay 2 power - Ready a hero ship or gear. This ability costs power -1 if the targeted card is Asgard. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: John Sheppard
card.property: Pisces: While you have at least one Ancient gear or Ancient ship, John Sheppard gets Science +1 and Combat +1. Triangulum: While you have at least three Ancient gears and/or Ancient ships, John Sheppard gets Culture +1 and Science +1. Pisces and Triangulum, Pay 3 power - Ready an Ancient gear or Ancient ship.

card.name: Jolan
card.property: Each time Jolan earns a glyph, you may place a lore token on another team character (destroy any such token that were already on that character). If you do, you may pay 3 power to ready that character.

card.name: Jonas Quinn
card.property: Gemini: Jonas Quinn gets skills +1 while there was a successful mission this turn. LibraJonas Quinn gets skills +1 while there was a failed mission this turn. Gemini and Libra: Jonas Quinn gets Combat +1 and Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Loki
card.property: Orion or Scorpius, Stop Loki, pay 1 power - Choose a character in your discard pile and play them from there at no cost. You can do this even if you already control a character who has the same title (even a team character). At the end of this turn, purge that character.

card.name: Louis Ferretti
card.property: Success: For each Triangulum glyph Louis Ferretti has, you may ready an SGC support character.

card.name: Malek
card.property: Orion: Each time you play a support character during a Science mission, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Malek. Pisces: Each time you play a support character during a Combat mission, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Malek.

card.name: Melnyk
card.property: Each time a team character earns a Triangulum glyph, you may pay 1 power. If you do, take a gear or a Russian support character from your discard pile into hand. If Melnyk is the character earning that glyph, gain 1 power.

card.name: Nicholas Rush
card.property: Orion: Nicholas Rush gets experience +1. Orion and Pisces: Nicholas Rush gets experience +1. Orion and Scorpius: Nicholas Rush gets experience +1.

card.name: Radek Zelenka
card.property: Scorpius: Radek Zelenka gets skills +1 while there are at least two obstacles and/or complications at the current mission. Triangulum: Radek Zelenka gets skills +1 while there are at least three obstacles and/or complications at the current mission.

card.name: Raynolds
card.property: Orion or Pisces, Destroy a gear - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission that costs less than that gear. You can do this only once each turn. Orion and Pisces: Gears and hero ships cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Richard Woolsey
card.property: Orion or Pisces: If a mission was failed this turn, Richard Woolsey gets Culture +1 and Ingenuity +1 for each different glyph he has. Orion and Pisces, Block a team character from the current mission, discard a card - Draw two cards.

card.name: Ronan Dex
card.property: Gemini: Each time you play a Combat mission, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Ronon Dex and a Particle Magnum gear. Pisces: Ronon Dex gets skills +1 for each failed mission.

card.name: Shaq'rel
card.property: Gemini: Shaq'rel gets skills +1 while a Jaffa hero ship is assigned. Libra, Stop a hero ship, pay 2 power - Ready a character. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Steven Caldwell
card.property: Gemini: Steven Caldwell gets "Victory: The current mission gets difficulty -1." Scorpius: Steven Caldwell gets "Victory: The current mission gets difficulty -1." Gemini and Scorpius: Each time you play a mission, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready an Atlantis or SGC ship.

card.name: "Todd"
card.property: The first time each turn that a player drains 1 or more, gain 1 power for each different glyph "Todd" has. Pisces or Scorpius: "Todd's" first ability triggers even while you are the villain player.

card.name: Accelerated Training
card.property: To play this event, stop a team character with 2 Ingenuity or more. Block all support characters from the current mission. At the end of the mission, each ready support character gets Culture +1, Science +1, Combat +1, and Ingenuity +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Always Prepared
card.property: Choose a character and choose one: that character can perform one of their "only once each turn" abilities an additional time this turn; or that character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. Then, draw a card.

card.name: Applied Knowledge
card.property: Choose a team character and choose one: they get Culture +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to their Science; or they get Science +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to their Culture.

card.name: Asgard Intervention
card.property: To play this event, stop any number of Asgard ships (this can be zero). This event costs power -2 to play for each Asgard ship you stopped. Choose one: stop each adversary and villain ship; or ready and/or unblock each team character.

card.name: Begin Evasive Maneuvers!
card.property: To play this event, you must pay 1 power for each assigned hero ship. Ready each assigned hero ship. Your opponent readies that many assigned villain ships. Each ship readied by this event is blocked until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Benefits of Experience
card.property: Choose a character to get skills +1 for each promotion token they have, until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Deal Renegotiation
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your deck, plus three more for each failed mission this turn. You may reveal a hero card from among them and take it into hand. Then, shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

card.name: Fighting Spirit
card.property: Choose a team character and choose one: they get Combat +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to their Ingenuity; or they get Ingenuity +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to their Combat.

card.name: Go! Go! Go!
card.property: Unblock each support character, then draw a card for each character this event unblocked.

card.name: Joyous Occasion
card.property: To play this event, stop a team character. Choose up to two support characters. You may ready each of them. They get skills +1 (or +2 if they are both Jaffa) until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Jury-Rigged Gate
card.property: To play this event, destroy a gear. Look at the number of cards from the top of your mission pile equal to the cost of the destroyed gear. Place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that pile, in any order.

card.name: Acquired Technology
card.property: Each time you play a gear, you may destroy this gear. If you do, gain 1 power. Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Until the end of the turn, your cards consider your hero ship cards to also have the gear trait, wherever they are (in play, in your hand, in your deck, or in your discard pile).

card.name: Attero Device
card.property: Destroy this gear and a hero ship - Your opponent loses power equal to the destroyed ship's cost. Destroy this gear, pay 3 power - Destroy a villain ship. If it was a Wraith ship, gain 1 power and draw a card.

card.name: Camouflage
card.property: Each time a character would be destroyed or incapacitated, you may destroy this gear and pay 2 power. If you do, stop that character instead.

card.name: Claymore Mine
card.property: When this gear is destroyed, destroy an assigned adversary. Pay 2 power - Destroy this gear.

card.name: Direct Line
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Draw a card. Destroy this gear, pay 2 power - Destroy a Political obstacle or an assigned Political adversary.

card.name: Life-Signs Detector
card.property: Stop this gear, pay X power - Turn X complications face up. Destroy each of them that are hero card, then turn the remaining cards face down. For each destroyed complication, your opponent must discard a card.

card.name: Naquadah Reactor Mk II
card.property: At the end of your power phase, gain 2 power. Stop and destroy this gear - Ready each other gear.

card.name: Refined Tretonin
card.property: When you play this gear, choose a Jaffa support character. Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Ready the chosen Jaffa support character. When either this gear or the chosen Jaffa support character is destroyed, destroy both instead.

card.name: RG/BST SG Railgun
card.property: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission - Until the end of the current mission, to assign a ship, your opponent must pay 2 power.

card.name: Sangraal
card.property: Stop this gear and any number of characters with a total of 4 Culture or more, or 4 Science or more - Gain 2 power. Destroy this gear, pay 2 power - Choose an Ori adversary in your opponent's villain score pile and have them place it in their discard pile.

card.name: Symbiote Poison Payload
card.property: Destroy this gear, stop an NID team character, pay 4 power - Destroy all Goa'uld and Jaffa obstacles and adversaries at the current mission. Destroy all assigned Jaffa support characters and incapacitate all assigned Jaffa team characters. This ability costs power -1 for each NID character with a glyph.

card.name: Tollan Phase-Shifter
card.property: Destroy this gear, pay X power - Choose an obstacle at the current mission whose cost is X+1 or less, or a prepared obstacle whose cost is X+2 or less. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wraith Retrovirus
card.property: Stop this gear - Reveal a random card from your opponent's hand. If it's a Wraith card, they must drain 1. Destroy this gear, pay 2 power - Destroy an assigned Wraith adversary, or a Wraith obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Adria's Wrath
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character, then your opponent may destroy a support character. If they don't, the chosen character is blocked. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Adrift
card.property: Failure: Stop a hero ship. Prepare this ambush/ Ambush (Science): Choose a hero ship. It is blocked until the end of the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle does not unblock it.

card.name: Alien Treatment
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses a stopped support character. Ready and unblock them. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Asuran Network
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns a character who has no glyph, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Attack Formation
card.property: Victory: You may ready a villain ship. Failure: You may ready a villain ship.

card.name: Back to Basics
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. Each positive modifier to their skills this character has received so far this turn from activated abilities, events, and boosts ends now.

card.name: Banshee's Wail
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may pay 1 power. If you do, take a Combat obstacle card from your discard pile into hand. If it is Wraith, your opponent must drain 2.

card.name: Black Knight
card.property: Failure: The next mission this turn gets difficulty +1. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Combat): Choose a character who is blocked until the end of the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle doesn't unblock them.

card.name: Booby-Trapped Tablet
card.property: Goa'uld and Jaffa adversaries can't be revived. Failure: Stop a team character. If they're Jaffa, incapacitate them instead.

card.name: Bugs in the Walls
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose one: stop a gear; or destroy a stopped gear.

card.name: Collapsed Tunnels
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Ingenuity): Your opponent may pay 1 power for each ready team character. If they don't, each team character is blocked until the end of the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle doesn't unblock them.

card.name: Complications
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may play a complication at no cost. Then, turn this obstacle face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Confidential Information
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture): Choose a character with no affiliation trait who is blocked from the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle doesn't unblock them.

card.name: Critical Condition
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a character and place this obstacle face up on them. The next time this character would cease to be incapacitated, this obstacle is destroyed instead.

card.name: Crystal Skull
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a team character. They can't be assigned with other team characters, nor can they be assigned with that character. Destroy this obstacle when your opponent succeeds at a mission.

card.name: Dead Man Switch
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready team character. While the chosen character is assigned, each other assigned character gets skills -1.

card.name: Deceitful Overture
card.property: Failure: Stop a character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Ingenuity): Gain 2 power.

card.name: Energy-Based Life Forms
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each ready gear. Failure: Destroy a support character for each ready gear.

card.name: Genetic Experiments
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses an assigned team character. They are stopped. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Goa'uld Personal Cloak
card.property: Failure: You may ready an adversary. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science/Combat): You may discard a villain card. If you do, destroy a support character whose cost is lower than the cost you discarded.

card.name: Grief-Stricken
card.property: When you play this obstacle, if a support character has been destroyed during this mission, block a character.

card.name: Guardian Dragon
card.property: Success or Failure: Destroy each assigned support character with contributing skill 1 or less. Failure: Incapacitate a character.

card.name: Hunting Party
card.property: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character. Failure: Destroy a stopped support character.

card.name: Illac Renin Templars
card.property: Dominion. This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each Ori card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Jaffa Reinforcements
card.property: When you play this obstacle, if you have an assigned ship, you may choose a Jaffa obstacle or a Jaffa adversary in your discard pile and take it into hand.

card.name: Kirsan Fever
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. Each time they are assigned, place a counter on this obstacle, then your opponent must drain 1 for each counter on this obstacle. Destroy this obstacle when your opponent succeeds at a Science mission.

card.name: Mind Tricks
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a support character. They are blocked. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: No Escape
card.property: When you play this obstacle, if there is an assigned hero ship, and if your current total firepower at this mission is greater than your opponent's, you may trigger the Victory text on a villain card at the current mission. Victory: Gain 1 power.

card.name: Pilgrims
card.property: While a Goa'uld or Jaffa adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets Dominion. Success: Stop a character.

card.name: Possession
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. Your opponent may pay 2 power. If they don't, stop the chosen character.

card.name: Replicator Torpedo
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a hero ship and stop it. It becomes a villain ship under your control, with no game text, and the Replicator trait.

card.name: Risky Armistice
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a support character. Stop them.Success: Ready the chosen character. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Serial Murders
card.property: When you play this obstacle, if a character has been wounded during this mission, destroy a support character.

card.name: Shock and Awe
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Goa'uld adversary is assigned. Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat): At the beginning of this mission's resolution, the obstacle with the lowest cost gets dominion.

card.name: Spellbound
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an affiliation trait on an assigned team character. Each other character with that affiliation trait is blocked.

card.name: Touch of Death
card.property: Failure: Choose an assigned character. For each non-wound token on them, destroy that token and replace it with a wound token. Then, wound them once.

card.name: Twin Destinies
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may pay 3 power. If you do, for each character, if there is a card in their owner's discard pile with the same title, they are blocked.

card.name: Venomous Bite
card.property: Failure: Choose one: Destroy a support character; or incapacitate a team character. If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may pay 1 power. If you do, choose both options.

card.name: Visitation
card.property: Dominion. Success: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science): Your opponent may pay 2 power. If they don't, score this obstacle.

card.name: Voyeur
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop a gear. If they don't choose a character. They are blocked.

card.name: Prometheus
card.property: Prometheus gets firepower +1 for each assigned NID or SGC team character. Victory: Choose a character to get skills +1 for each promotion token they have, until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Skithblathnir
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may destroy it. If you do, destroy a villain ship. Victory: You may pay X power. If you do, incapacitate an assigned villain ship that costs X+2 or less.

card.name: Traveler Colony Ship
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may pay 2 power. If you do, unblock a character. Then, you may act again.

card.name: Apophis' Tel'tak
card.property: Failure: Until the end of the current mission, when you score an adversary, you may also score this ship.

card.name: Ori Supergate
card.property: When you play this ship, you may search your deck for another Ori ship. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. While this ship is assigned, the victory text of each villain card occurs an additional time.

card.name: Ori Warship
card.property: Victory: If your opponent had at least one assigned ship during this ship battle's resolution, you may play, at no cost, and Ori obstacle whose cost is lower than or equal to the difference of total firepower between you and your opponent.
